products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Rosewood Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stunning Rosewood Pink roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control.
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This pink roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2070 Fabric Colour: Rosewood Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Lipstick Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please.
This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our roller blinds are value for money and easy to install.
For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.

products.title: Splash Flamingo Pink Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Flamingo Pink Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Flamingo Pink is a beautiful bright pink shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Flamingo Pink roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Splash Bossa
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Bossa Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
